abstract: Charter Communications said Tuesday that a bankruptcy judge has confirmed its reorganization plan, clearing the way for the fourth-largest U.S. cable TV operator to emerge from Chapter 11 in a few weeks.
snippet: Charter Communications said Tuesday that a bankruptcy judge has confirmed its reorganization plan, clearing the way for the fourth-largest U.S. cable TV operator to emerge from Chapter 11 in a few weeks.
lead_paragraph: Charter Communications said Tuesday a bankruptcy judge has confirmed its reorganization plan, clearing the way for the nation’s fourth-largest cable TV operator to emerge from Chapter 11 in a few weeks.
